storyInfo: Venezia Senior decides to let the old tailor and his grandson leave as a testament to the famiglia's creed of 'decency'. Ingrid returns the family crest to him, officially leaving the Venezias, and bids farewell to the old Venezia who have treated her as his own daughter.

attributes.content: Signor Antonio, I'm done taking Signor Fabrizio's measurements.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: We have the fabric he wants in stock, so if we hurry, the suit can be finished in time. We won't interfere in your affairs.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: ...Papa?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I'll be taking Luchino home now.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Nonno, they're definitely not planning to let us go...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Just go. I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Signora Venezia, what about you...?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I'm afraid I have some family affairs to settle.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Anton, I think you know what the Don's thinking. Send your men away.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can't settle it like this, Papa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Umberto made me a promise. We can't keep our guest in here forever, Anton.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But Ingrid—Your actions have indeed embarrassed us.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Mi scusi.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's important to me that they live.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: (Go.)
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: *sigh* Ingrid, I've been hoping to meet you from the moment I stepped into this city.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But not like this.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: We Venezias never point our blades inward.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: *cough* Come, Luchino.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The medicine!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I left them in the room inside, and the goods I was supposed to deliver... they frisked me when I was brought here—Nonno, I-I'll go retrieve them.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Forget it, boy.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The Venezia residence is several blocks away from our shop. It's a long way back.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Luchino turns around, and does not see any mafioso come out from the residence.
He feels the old tailor's hand on his shoulder. He can feel the wizened hand trembling, as if he had exhausted his strength during the meeting with the old Venezia earlier.
To make matters worse, he realizes his own arms are still so scrawny. If his nonno falls, he might not even manage to hold him up.
Nonno...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: N-Nothing.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino has questions in his head that he can't voice. But suddenly, he recalls a vague image in his mind resembling their current walk back home on an equally strange road.
Was he three, or four?
He remembers a vehicle driving by the farm. An old man jumps down, fails his landing, and falls clumsily.

The old man then walks up to him. He stares at the mud on his face, a pair of scissors, and a ruler on his waist, and bursts into tears from fear. The old man panics, frantically trying to soothe him—
There were far fewer wrinkles on his face then.

The old man takes him by the hand and leads him away from the farm. Uncertain of where they're going, he cries even louder in fear. The noise startles nearby fowlbeasts, sending them flying into the distance.
'Hush, Luchino. Don't cry.'
'Umberto, say something, anything... Ah, Nonno will tell you a tale...'
'Every hunter runs into a wolf before they go into the wastes.'

'The wolf says: Mulberry wood makes sturdy bows, and stones can be sharpened into deadly blades; but you must shed the clothes on you to survive, for it is the only thing that does not belong in the barrens...'
'Haha, you really stopped crying. Did you like the story, bambino? I know many, many more...'
Nonno.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Can you teach me how to sew buttons on again?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I'm glad you're willing to listen to this vecchio's suggestion to stay here and catch up on old times, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I thought you would have left like you did the last time, with your blade in hand without looking back.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I also thought traveling to Higashi would bring me calm. But as you can see, I could not escape.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: From the moment I set foot in here, I knew it would not be easy to leave.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: So you are set on leaving, Ingrid?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You can try to stop me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The Don is right, we Venezias never point our blades inward.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The Vulpo takes something out from her coat.
Antonio knows too well what it is—the family crest. He received one just like it when he decided to follow Fabrizio.
Are you sure?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Forgive me. I have a feeling you won't approve of what I want to do next.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: If this crest is stopping me from untangling the knot in my heart, then I have no other option.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...You're being selfish, ragazza.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Why did you throw a stone at me, ragazzina?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Accident, I swear. I was trying to hit those stronzi that ran away and then you, you got in my way...
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: The wound on your face... did they do that to you?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: They say my ears are big and weird. They say I'm not a Lupo and don't belong here in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Did you see their injuries? They ended up worse than I did. Why run their mouths if they can't defeat me? I'll pull out their teeth the next time they try me again!
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Haha, you're more of a Lupo than they are.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Where's your family?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Dead. We came here as refugees, but papa and mama encountered a gang brawl when they went to ask the government for help.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Do you have anywhere else to go?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Do you want to come with me then?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: You need me to fight for you?
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: We can talk about that when you're older.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: My daughter, Bella... she's sick and doesn't really go out, so she could use a playmate...
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: If she's fine playing with a Vulpo, I don't mind.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: That's it?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I'm weak. I've been staying here in the park, but I can't beat everyone up.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Take this.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Famiglia Venezia's crest. Take it, and you become one of us.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But I'm not a Lupo.
attributes.name: Obstinate Girl

attributes.content: Many in the famiglia aren't either, but we're even closer to each other than the other famiglie. You'll understand in time.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Don't hide behind your mother like that. She can block your body, but I can already see your tails.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: So this is Lisa?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: She's a complete contrast to you when you were a girl, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Sorry. For not telling you before I brought her back here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The vecchi at the shrine discovered this child, and I couldn't let her stay in Higashi any longer.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Because having the blood of the so-called nine-tails means spending your entire life inside the shrine, living a life like her father. Worshiped like a mascot that grants every request, è ridicolo.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: We've tidied up a room for her. Once she gets used to life here, she can go to school with the other children in the famiglia.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I hope Lisa will stay far away from the farce in Higashi, but I don't want her to learn the so-called Siracusan way to survive either.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Arrange this with Anton and hire professional teachers for her. Music, literature, art, astrology, Originium Arts... Let her study whatever she likes.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: You're not mad at me?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You're still here, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Has your blade slowed? Have you completed fewer missions?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Then you remain the most reliable person to take over my responsibilities.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Si.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Besides, I find myself fond of this bambina.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: So the most important thing to do right now is show her I'm not scary. Haha.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Still nothing?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I snapped the tendons in that stronzo's limbs and tail, but he still refused to confess who planned the assassination. He just kept saying he didn't know anything...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Same as the other seventeen before him.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Lisa just fell asleep a moment ago.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Her Oripathy is quite severe. The crystals have spread to her shoulder, there's no need for you to look after her yourself.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I've taken my precautions. Besides, she got infected because of me. Ingrid, you've been silent on this.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Lisa's an innocent girl. She doesn't know how bad things are outside, but she can instinctively pick up the tension in the house.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: When you went to rescue Antonio, she wanted to stay with me so you could worry less.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The people from Rhodes Island are here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: So you already found a place better for her.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The famiglia can find the best Oripathy doctor for Lisa. You didn't have to contact that Rhodes Island company behind my back.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Ingrid, there's no need for you two to leave.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia will visit Terni herself tomorrow. The Tancredis and the Venezias will have no choice but to sit at the negotiation table.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You need to wipe my name off the famiglia records by then. Insist I was expelled, like how the Tancredis refused even at the brink of death to acknowledge they planned your assassination.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I remember discussing this before.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Don Venezia. The famiglia crest, take it back.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: No, Ingrid. Keep it.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I have approved of you taking revenge for Lisa. I am fond of her. Why else do you think no one from the famiglia has stopped you these past two weeks?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: We are family, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: 'We are family.'
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: This emblem has been a blessing from you, but also a shackle for me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: How is she doing on Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: She's considered an employee now. A few years ago, she even went to Leithanien and helped them investigate an incident about missing Infected.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: She even kept it a secret from me and never mentioned it in her letters. I talked to her friends when I went to see her, and they were all saying how well she did on that mission.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I miss Lisa so much.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: If she's willing to come back, I won't stop her... You know I'm not here to reminisce about old times.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Perhaps you had many plans for me when you insisted I keep the famiglia emblem—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid glances at Antonio standing silently on the side.
Keep it, Ingrid. Papa was telling me how we could all visit Montelupe together after Carnevale is over.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Anton, it's too early for that.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Didn't you say Signora Sicilia might relent?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: She used to loathe Carnevale, and now it's back in Siracusa with a brand new look. Compared to that, Ingrid's violations are not even worth mentioning.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I mean, it's been six years. Famiglia Tancredi today is no longer worthy of Signora Sicilia's concern.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: In these six years, I used the single vehicle factory I held onto and ate up all of their businesses in Terni.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia values results. So I showed her.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Is that how you see it, Anton?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Yes, papa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Antonio's done very well by your side. The family no longer needs me here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Anton... After Bella's passing, I could feel him becoming wary of me.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: How much value did he have as a son-in-law after Bellas's death? That's probably what he was thinking at the time, and how he got himself so busy after.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Papa, I—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I don't want to give you too much pressure. We already have enough territory, even in this newly-built Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: You've done very well, Anton.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Seeing Ingrid leave and Bella die... what I truly care about is the few 'family' I have left... After all, I am an old man.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I don't want to lose any of you anymore.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Ingrid looks at the old man whose hair has turned entirely gray, and does not say anything else.
She puts the crest on the table.
Ingrid, you heard what he said. At least for now—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Ingrid turns and leaves before Antonio can even finish.
Mi dispiace, Don Venezia...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I know it's hard for you, but... I can't do it.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: There's never been much I could do for you, besides killing.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But even the best killer is still just a killer, not 'Venezia Junior'. Antonio fits that role better than I can, so my departure isn't such a big loss.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You must have realized it in the past six years. Deep inside you're disappointed with me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But wasn't I disappointed too, when I failed to find out the truth about her injury?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Oripathy is incurable. You know better than anyone else why I came back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I intend to find the culprit I couldn't track down six years ago... and end his life. That's the only thing I want to do.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But you know what it means to abandon the emblem and leave.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Yes. We might end up as oppositions.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I can't guarantee that I won't harm any of the Venezias.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Even so, I'll make things decent, for your sake. This is the only thing I can promise you.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Papa, I can try and talk to her more...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The old man runs his fingers over the famiglia crest, and puts it in his chest pocket.
We all know what kind of person she is.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: She's not easily swayed when she's set on something. I'll keep this emblem for now. When she comes to her senses, I'll return it to her.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Keep a low profile for now; consider it keeping me company at home.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But the company...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Do you not trust the subordinates you hired yourself?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I may not interfere with your work here in the city, but it doesn't mean I'm in the dark.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Umberto de Montano is an old friend of mine, and he has always acted with decency. So leave them be.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Yes, papa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I heard that Ingrid asked you about how Lisa got hurt. Did you find out the truth?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Just some clues. So much time has passed, after all.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Is that so? Anton, there are some matters you can judge on your own to be right or wrong...
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But when it involves the famiglia's reputation, think carefully before you act.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Yes, papa.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Antonio! We got news!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: According to intel from Capone and Gambino, we found the lost shipment at the port.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: B-But... Someone stuffed it in a parade float and set it on fire.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Who did it?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Not sure.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The cops took the Truckers' Union's boss away for an investigation. The one called 'Eirene', she...
attributes.name: Mafioso
